$INTC JUST LANDED ON MY WATCHLIST

Intel spent years drowning under the weight of too many fabs and too few high-value products -- filling them with commodity CPUs that crushed margins and killed every turnaround attempt.

That flipped this week when $NVDA took a 5% equity stake and guaranteed orders for custom CPUs designed to sit alongside GPUs -- high-margin, advanced packaging parts that finally give Intel predictable fab utilization.

In a market where every AI infra name has already re-rated to the moon, Intel is still sub-$150B. No other U.S. company has its manufacturing scale, and tying that footprint directly to Nvidia‚Äôs roadmap means fabs can finally run full with products that justify the cost --positioning Intel as the only U.S. scale manufacturer aligned with the most powerful growth curve of the AI economy.

2025 has been surreal.

There are plenty of questions about where all of this ultimately goes, but the reality is my life has shifted in ways I never could have mapped out. 44 TV appearances. A guest appearance on one of the top business podcasts in the world. Launching something as disruptive as @FuturumEquities and getting approval to become a sell-side shop.

Two years ago I started this account to transparently show how I could turn $100K into $1M. That was the experiment. I didn‚Äôt expect 55M monthly impressions. I didn‚Äôt expect to be on TV weekly, breaking down ideas in front of a national audience. I didn‚Äôt expect a platform or an audience of this scale. What I did expect -- and what I bet on -- was that hard work compounds. Stay disciplined, stay locked in, and the path reveals itself.

So when my growth portfolio crossed $1M this past week -- it was the moment that reminded me how far I‚Äôve come. From being early on names like $PLTR under $10, $RKLB under $4, $IONQ under $8, $CRWD under $100, and $ALAB under $50 -- all of which the market now chases after their 5x moves -- to seeing the early signs of what I believe are the next big reratings I‚Äôve called out with $EOSE, $TEM, $JMIA $DOCN, and $NVTS, it‚Äôs been about conviction before consensus. 

To hit that goal within ten days of my wedding made it even more meaningful -- proof that the personal and professional chapters of my life are compounding together. 

It felt like reaching the top of a hill after grinding every single day and realizing the view is even bigger than I imagined. Truly blessed.
